stories.title: Record Income and Expenses
stories.description: As a user, I want to add income and expense transactions so that I can track my cash flow.

stories.title: Categorize Transactions
stories.description: As a user, I want to assign categories to my transactions so that I can organize my finances.

stories.title: Set Category Budgets
stories.description: As a user, I want to set a monthly budget for each category so that I can control my spending.

stories.title: Track Budget Progress
stories.description: As a user, I want to see my actual spending versus my budget so that I can stay on track.

stories.title: View Spending Pie Chart
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a pie chart of my spending by category so that I understand my expense distribution.

stories.title: Analyze Monthly Trends
stories.description: As a user, I want to view line/bar charts of my monthly spending so that I can identify trends over time.

stories.title: Filter Transactions by Date
stories.description: As a user, I want to filter my transactions by a custom date range so that I can review specific periods.

stories.title: Export Financial Data
stories.description: As a user, I want to export my transaction data so that I can use it for external analysis or records.

summary: A personal finance tracker MVP enabling users to log transactions, categorize spending, set and monitor budgets, and visualize financial data through charts and exports.
